original_title: The Greatest Adventure: Book Of Dragons
overview: Join Finn and his dragon Haldor (both voiced by Kj Schrock) as they fly through the air on a one-of-the-kind adventure with classic bedtime stories along the way. This time, Finn and Haldor enjoy the incredible classic tale "The Book of Dragons".  â€”Offcial DVD Description
